评论详情: Wow.  This dress is absolutely stunning!  Fantastic fit!  I just wish there were more colors available!  I would definitely buy this again in other colors.
This dress hugs your curves. It's got stretch so it's comfy but does show every imperfection. The color is gorgeous.  It can easily be dressed up or down.
I liked the fit but it just was not my style. Too matronly in my opinion.  Had to return.
It did not cover or compliment  anything that one would need covered.
I received this dress today. It smells so bad of perfume. It was obviously used.

So I wore this dress to an evening wedding this weekend and it was perfect. Super comfortable,  loved the navy, and the low but modest neckline with the satin lapels give sexy elegance. The sleeves are long with ruching at the cuffs (would have been great with satin cuffs). Lastly the jersey is a really good quality.  The dress was crumpled at the bottom of the garment bag in my trunk for several hours, but there were no wrinkles.  I wore it with Susanny Rhinstone Kitten Heels, and a reemonde rhinestone shawl (50 degrees - brrr). I was cute, warm and sparkly.

I bought a size 10 in the midnight blue which fit perfectly. It is a very nice dress and a classic. I’m sure I will wear it for years to come.
